The MEME Suite

Motif-based sequence analysis tools

clustalw2phylip

Usage:

clustalw2phylip [options] <alignment file>

Description

This program converts a multiple alignment in ClustalW format into a PHYLIP file.

Input

<alignment file>

The name of a file containing one or more aligned sequences in ClustalW format.

Output

The program prints to standard output each of the sequences in the multiple alignment, in PHYLIP format.

Options

No optional arguments.
